The difference from the federal statutory rate of </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span><ix:nonFraction id="d45850056e559-wk-Fact-1C0DAAA4E8425BF08344A1EC421CE8B3" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFederalStatutoryIncomeTaxRate" contextRef="FD2020Q2YTD" unitRef="ratio" decimals="INF" scale="-2" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">21</ix:nonFraction>%</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> was primarily due to state income taxes and non-deductible share-based compensation, which were partially offset by the tax benefit we received from the federal research and experimentation credit.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Our effective tax rate for the three months ended </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">January&#160;31, 2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> was approximately </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span><ix:nonFraction id="d45850056e570-wk-Fact-201485F2C551BA670109F3816136F311" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperations" contextRef="FD2019Q2QTD" unitRef="ratio" decimals="2" scale="-2" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">20</ix:nonFraction>%</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. For the six months ended </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">January&#160;31, 2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> we recorded a tax benefit of </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45850056e578-wk-Fact-158FF711A6EE57BC9996EE2E7E5F5DA4" name="us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit" contextRef="FD2019Q2YTD" unitRef="usd" decimals="-6" scale="6" sign="-" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">2</ix:nonFraction> million</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> on pretax income of </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45850056e582-wk-Fact-1487EA176C3D5BC6BFCFEC109659953C" name="us-gaap:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesMinorityInterestAndIncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments" contextRef="FD2019Q2YTD" unitRef="usd" decimals="-6" scale="6" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">221</ix:nonFraction> million</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. from the federal research and experimentation credit.</span></div></ix:nonNumeric><div><br/></div><div style="text-align:center;"><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:10pt;"><div There were </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span><ix:nonFraction id="d45850056e624-wk-Fact-6D167A83E7B65FD0B6183CEA1E07720D" name="us-gaap:UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease" contextRef="FD2020Q2YTD" unitRef="usd" decimals="-6" scale="0" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction></span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> material changes to these amounts during the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months ended </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">January&#160;31, 2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. We do not believe that it is reasonably possible that there will be a significant increase or decrease in our unrecognized tax benefits over the next 12&#160;months.</span></div><div to the government&#8217;s approval of a method of accounting change request for fiscal 2018.</span></div></ix:continuation><div><a id="s79851E798C995AA6A6FF26C1EBA48CAE"></a></div><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="FD2020Q2YTD" name="us-gaap:StockholdersEquityNoteDisclosureTextBlock" id="TextSelection-6F5D07053EC9574B9B25981BA5C7E43D-0-wk-Fact-3C27F774A5CB55A2B5804B8E49BC75F3" continuedAt="TextSelection-6F5D07053EC9574B9B25981BA5C7E43D-1" escape="true"><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:24px;text-align:left;font-size:13pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Stockholders&#8217; Equity</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:99.80506822612085%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;border-bottom:1px dotted #0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:11pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;">Stock Repurchase Programs and Treasury Shares</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:8px;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Intuit&#8217;s Board of Directors has authorized a series of common stock repurchase programs. Shares of common stock repurchased under these programs become treasury shares. We repurchased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span><ix:nonFraction id="d45853805e499-wk-Fact-11F94E6B28045C61B401B45245891107" name="us-gaap:TreasuryStockSharesAcquired" contextRef="FD2020Q2YTD" unitRef="shares" decimals="-5" scale="6" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">1.0</ix:nonFraction> million</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> shares for </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45853805e503-wk-Fact-A3AD47FF4E3C5AC89902A3C2B51186E4" name="us-gaap:TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod" contextRef="FD2020Q2YTD" unitRef="usd" decimals="-6" scale="6" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">278</ix:nonFraction> million</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> under these programs during the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months ended </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">January&#160;31, 2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. Included in this amount were </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45853805e515-wk-Fact-20608D7FE98451C8861A2B22D3520FF3" name="us-gaap:TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod" contextRef="D2020Q3Jan" unitRef="usd" decimals="-6" scale="6" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">5</ix:nonFraction> million</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> of repurchases which occurred in late January 2020 and were settled in early February 2020. At </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">January&#160;31, 2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">, we had authorization from our Board of Directors to expend up to an additional&#160;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45853805e524-wk-Fact-C3AF9297140E57B2A0A5E19A88909E56" name="us-gaap:StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1" contextRef="FI2020Q2" unitRef="usd" decimals="-8" scale="9" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">2.4</ix:nonFraction> billion</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> for stock repurchases. Future stock repurchases under the current programs are at the discretion of management, and authorization of future stock repurchase programs is subject to the final determination of our Board of Directors.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Our treasury shares are repurchased at the market price on the trade date; accordingly, all amounts paid to reacquire these shares have been recorded as treasury stock on our condensed consolidated balance sheets. Repurchased shares of our common stock are held as treasury shares until they are reissued or retired. When we reissue treasury stock, if the proceeds from the sale are more than the average price we paid to acquire the shares we record an increase in additional paid-in capital. Conversely, if the proceeds from the sale are less than the average price we paid to acquire the shares, we record a decrease in additional paid-in capital to the extent of increases previously recorded for similar transactions and a decrease in retained earnings for any remaining amount.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">In the past we have satisfied option exercises and restricted stock unit vesting under our employee equity incentive plans by reissuing treasury shares, and we may do so again in the future. During the second quarter of fiscal 2014 we began issuing new shares of common stock to satisfy option exercises and RSU vesting under our 2005 Equity Incentive Plan. We have not yet determined the ultimate disposition of the shares that we have repurchased in the past, and consequently we continue to hold them as treasury shares.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" Litigation</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Beginning in May 2019, various legal proceedings were filed and certain regulatory inquiries were commenced in connection with the provision and marketing of our free online tax preparation programs. We believe that the allegations contained within the legal proceedings are without merit. We intend to vigorously defend against the legal proceedings and cooperate in the investigations.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Intuit is subject to certain routine legal proceedings, including class action lawsuits, as well as demands, claims, government inquiries and threatened litigation, that arise in the normal course of our business, including assertions that we may be infringing patents or other intellectual property rights of others. Our failure to obtain necessary license or other rights, or litigation arising out of intellectual property claims could adversely affect our business. We currently believe that, in addition to any amounts accrued, the amount of potential losses, if any, for any pending claims of any type (either alone or combined) will not have a material impact on our condensed consolidated financial statements. The ultimate outcome of any litigation is uncertain and, regardless of outcome, litigation can have an adverse impact on Intuit because of defense costs, negative publicity, diversion of management resources and other factors.</span></div></ix:nonNumeric><div><br/></div><div style="text-align:center;"><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:10pt;"><div Segment Information</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">We have defined our </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span><ix:nonFraction id="d45857123e485-wk-Fact-CDD4513046F7511FB0A9BB4CB84B35C9" name="us-gaap:NumberOfReportableSegments" contextRef="FD2020Q2YTD" unitRef="segment" decimals="INF" scale="0" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">three</ix:nonFraction></span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> reportable segments, described below, based on factors such as how we manage our operations and how our chief operating decision maker views results. We define the chief operating decision maker as our Chief Executive Officer and our Chief Financial Officer. Our chief operating decision maker organizes and manages our business primarily on the basis of product and service offerings.</span><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:middle;background-color:#eaf8ff;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:1pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:1pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&#160;</span></div><div style="padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Small Business &amp; Self-Employed</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">This segment serves small businesses and the self-employed around the world, and the accounting professionals who serve and advise them. Our offerings include QuickBooks financial and business management online services and desktop software, payroll solutions, merchant payment processing solutions, and financing for small businesses.</span></div><div style="padding-left:24px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Consumer</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">This segment serves consumers and includes do-it-yourself and assisted TurboTax income tax preparation products and services sold in the U.S. and Canada. Our Mint and Turbo offerings serve consumers and help them understand and improve their financial lives by offering a view of their financial health.</span></div><div style="padding-top:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Strategic Partner</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">This segment serves professional accountants in the U.S. and Canada, who are essential to both small business success and tax preparation and filing. Our professional tax offerings include Lacerte, ProSeries, ProFile, and ProConnect Tax Online.</span></div><div style="padding-top:8px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><br/></span></div><div style="padding-top:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:1pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:1pt;">&#160;</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">All of our segments operate primarily in the United States and sell primarily to customers in the United States. International total net revenue was approximately </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span><ix:nonFraction id="d45857123e537-wk-Fact-92A73F1BF03F549A9CEE4635D44EF9DC" name="intu:InternationalTotalNetRevenueAsPercentageOfTotal" contextRef="FD2020Q2YTD" unitRef="ratio" decimals="INF" scale="-2" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">5</ix:nonFraction>%</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> of consolidated total net revenue for all periods presented.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">We include expenses such as corporate selling and marketing, product development, general and administrative, and share-based compensation, which are not allocated to specific segments, in unallocated corporate items. Unallocated corporate items also include amortization of acquired technology, amortization of other acquired intangible assets, and goodwill and intangible asset impairment charges.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:8px;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">The accounting policies of our reportable segments are the same as those described in the summary of significant accounting policies in </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Note 1</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> to the financial statements in Part II, Item&#160;8 of our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">July&#160;31, 2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and in </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Note 1</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">, </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-style:italic;">"Description of Business and Summary of Significant Accounting Policies &#8211; Significant Accounting Policies"</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q. Except for goodwill and purchased intangible assets, we do not generally track assets by reportable segment and, consequently, we do not disclose total assets by reportable segment.</span></div><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="FD2020Q2YTD" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfSegmentReportingInformationBySegmentTextBlock" Subsequent Event</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">On February 24, 2020, we entered into an agreement and plan of merger (the Merger Agreement) to acquire Credit Karma, Inc., (Credit Karma) for </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45851393e474-wk-Fact-B4BF692A5A77452EDBF66498EF61BC6F" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransferred1" contextRef="D2020Q3Feb24_us-gaap_BusinessAcquisitionAxis_intu_CreditKarmaIncMember_us-gaap_SubsequentEventTypeAxis_us-gaap_SubsequentEventMember" unitRef="usd" decimals="-8" scale="9" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">7.1</ix:nonFraction> billion</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">, subject to certain customary adjustments set forth in the Merger Agreement. We are acquiring Credit Karma to expand our consumer finance platform and accelerate our mission of powering prosperity around the world and helping consumers to make ends meet.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">The purchase price for Credit Karma will be payable in equal portions of cash and Intuit common stock, with the shares being valued at </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45851393e481-wk-Fact-1C3C2C0E2152513E25E6736A4963CBE0" name="us-gaap:BusinessAcquisitionSharePrice" contextRef="I2020Q3Feb21_us-gaap_BusinessAcquisitionAxis_intu_CreditKarmaIncMember_us-gaap_SubsequentEventTypeAxis_us-gaap_SubsequentEventMember" unitRef="usdPerShare" decimals="4" scale="0" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">299.7306</ix:nonFraction></span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> per share (which price was calculated based on the daily volume-weighted average sales price per share for Intuit common stock for the ten trading days ending on February 21, 2020). The per share price of these shares has been fixed as of the Merger Agreement signing date. The aggregate value of these shares will fluctuate based on changes in our share price between the signing date and the closing date.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">The total consideration of </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45851393e488-wk-Fact-B4BF692A5A77452EDBF66498EF61BC6F" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransferred1" contextRef="D2020Q3Feb24_us-gaap_BusinessAcquisitionAxis_intu_CreditKarmaIncMember_us-gaap_SubsequentEventTypeAxis_us-gaap_SubsequentEventMember" unitRef="usd" decimals="-8" scale="9" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">7.1</ix:nonFraction> billion</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> includes an estimated </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45851393e492-wk-Fact-EA47D4F419C01DC0B217649CD6633496" unitRef="usd" decimals="-8" scale="9" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">1.0</ix:nonFraction> billion</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> for the fair value of equity awards that will be expensed over service periods of up to </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span><ix:nonNumeric contextRef="D2020Q3Feb24_us-gaap_AwardTypeAxis_intu_EquityAwardMember_us-gaap_BusinessAcquisitionAxis_intu_CreditKarmaIncMember_us-gaap_SubsequentEventTypeAxis_us-gaap_SubsequentEventMember" format="ixt-sec:durwordsen">three years</ix:nonNumeric></span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. Additionally, as part of the merger agreement, following the close of the transaction we have agreed to issue approximately </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45851393e500-wk-Fact-B6E22ABC3B17E65A1B69649DF05BAD01" name="us-gaap:BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransferredEquityInterestsIssuedAndIssuable" contextRef="D2020Q3Feb24_us-gaap_AwardTypeAxis_us-gaap_RestrictedStockUnitsRSUMember_us-gaap_BusinessAcquisitionAxis_intu_CreditKarmaIncMember_us-gaap_SubsequentEventTypeAxis_us-gaap_SubsequentEventMember" unitRef="usd" decimals="-6" scale="6" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">300</ix:nonFraction> million</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> of restricted stock units, which will be charged to expense over a service period of </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span><ix:nonNumeric id="d45851393e504-wk-Fact-64BD43D38B329BEFCC39736E8FCF7102" name="intu:BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransferredEquityInterestsIssuedandIssuablePeriodofRecognition" contextRef="D2020Q3Feb24_us-gaap_AwardTypeAxis_us-gaap_RestrictedStockUnitsRSUMember_us-gaap_BusinessAcquisitionAxis_intu_CreditKarmaIncMember_us-gaap_SubsequentEventTypeAxis_us-gaap_SubsequentEventMember" format="ixt-sec:durwordsen">four years</ix:nonNumeric></span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. The cash portion of the purchase price is expected to be financed with our existing cash and unsecured revolving credit facility.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">The Merger Agreement must be approved by Credit Karma shareholders and is subject to receipt of required regulatory approvals and satisfaction or waiver of other customary closing conditions. The transaction is expected to close before the end of calendar year 2020. Additionally, if the Merger Agreement is terminated as a result of reaching its termination date (10 months from the signing date unless extended by us by up to five additional months) without receiving clearance to close under the Hart-Scott-Rodino Antitrust Improvements Act of 1976 or on the termination date there is in effect an order or injunction or similar restraint preventing consummation of the transaction under applicable U.S. antitrust laws, then under certain circumstances we would be obligated to pay Credit Karma a termination fee of between </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45851393e511-wk-Fact-EF0AE9ECB1CC94D2B9A8649E468BAE07" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">230</ix:nonFraction> million</span></span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><span>$<ix:nonFraction id="d45851393e515-wk-Fact-D45C888745091A05BABD7369739BA9F2" OF FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:16pt;"><span Please see the section entitled &#8220;Forward-Looking Statements&#8221; immediately preceding Part I for important information to consider when evaluating such statements.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">You should read this MD&amp;A in conjunction with the financial statements and related notes in Part&#160;I, Item&#160;1 of this Quarterly Report and our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">July&#160;31, 2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">We adopted the new lease standard effective August 1, 2019 under the modified retrospective approach applied at the beginning of the period of adoption. See </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Note 1</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> to the financial statements in Part&#160;I, Item&#160;1 of this Quarterly Report for more information.</span></div><div><a id="sBA2A1FE52AC45C19AA6BDCC101A960D1"></a></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:16px;text-align:left;font-size:13pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:13pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:13pt;color:#ffffff;font-weight:bold;">EXECUTIVE OVERVIEW</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">This overview provides a high-level discussion of our operating results and some of the trends that affect our business. We believe that an understanding of these trends is important in order to understand our financial results as well as our future prospects. This summary is not intended to be exhaustive, nor is it a substitute for the detailed discussion and analysis provided elsewhere in this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:11pt;color:#ffffff;font-style:italic;">About Intuit</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Intuit helps consumers, small businesses, and the self-employed prosper by delivering financial management and compliance products and services. We also provide specialized tax products to accounting professionals, who are key partners that help us serve small business customers. We organize our businesses into three reportable segments &#8211; Small Business &amp; Self-Employed, Consumer, and Strategic Partner.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:28px;text-align:center;padding-left:18px;text-indent:0px;font-size:10pt;"><img src="chart-bac5d0d7c4e657a7862.jpg" alt="chart-bac5d0d7c4e657a7862.jpg" style="height:266px;width:266px;"></img><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:middle;background-color:#eaf8ff;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:1pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:1pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&#160;</span></div><div style="padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Small Business &amp; Self-Employed</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">This segment serves small businesses and the self-employed around the world, and the accounting professionals who serve and advise them. Our offerings include QuickBooks financial and business management online services and desktop software, payroll solutions, merchant payment processing solutions, and financing for small businesses.</span></div><div style="padding-left:24px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Consumer</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">This segment serves consumers and includes do-it-yourself and assisted TurboTax income tax preparation products and services sold in the U.S. and Canada. Our Mint and Turbo offerings serve consumers and help them understand and improve their financial lives by offering a view of their financial health.</span></div><div style="padding-top:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Strategic Partner</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">This segment serves professional accountants in the U.S. and Canada, who are essential to both small business success and tax preparation and filing. Our professional tax offerings include Lacerte, ProSeries, ProFile, and ProConnect Tax Online.</span></div><div style="padding-top:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:1pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:1pt;">&#160;</span></div><div style="padding-top:8px;padding-left:24px;font-size:1pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:1pt;"><br/></span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div><br/></div><div style="text-align:center;"><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:10pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="4"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:1%;"></td><td style="width:49%;"></td><td style="width:48%;"></td><td style="width:2%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;border-top:1.5px solid #0077c5;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;border-top:1.5px solid #0077c5;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;border-top:1.5px solid #0077c5;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;border-top:1.5px solid #0077c5;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">&#160;Intuit</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;">&#160;Q2 Fiscal 2020 Form 10-Q</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:right;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;"> 24</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"></hr><div><div style="line-height:120%;font-size:9pt;"><a style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;" href="#s64E223D5AFFE5818B3BEE723B397EC39"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Table of Contents</span></a></div></div><div><br/></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:28px;text-align:center;text-indent:0px;font-size:11pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-bottom:8px;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:11pt;color:#ffffff;font-style:italic;">Our Growth Strategy</span></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-top:8px;font-size:4pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:4pt;"><br/></span></div><div style="padding-top:8px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">At Intuit, our strategy starts with customer obsession. We listen to and observe our customers, understand their challenges, and then use advanced technology, including artificial intelligence (A.I.), to develop innovative solutions designed to solve their problems and help them grow and prosper. For more than three decades, our values have inspired us to innovate and reimagine ways to save people time and money, eliminate drudgery and inspire confidence. We have reinvented and disrupted ourselves to better serve our customers, as we continue to transform into an A.I.-driven expert platform company. Our assessment of external trends - the expectation of more personalized experiences, the digitization of services, as well as the growth in the self-employed workforce - reveals significant opportunities to drive future growth. The result is a shift from traditional services and point solutions to interconnected capabilities that work on platforms and increasingly rely on A.I. and data-driven solutions.</span></div><div style="padding-top:8px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">As we build those interconnected capabilities that rely on an A.I.-driven expert platform we are focused on three core elements:</span></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:middle;background-color:#eaf8ff;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-left:30px;text-indent:0px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c6;">&#8226; </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">Building an open, trusted platform</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">&#160;We are creating a technology platform where we and our partners can seamlessly integrate together to solve the most pressing customer problems and deliver awesome experiences. Our open platform allows our customers to use and confidently share their data, with their consent, with us and third-party partners to help improve their financial lives.</span></div><div style="padding-left:30px;text-indent:0px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:9pt;"><br/></span></div><div style="padding-left:30px;text-indent:0px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c6;">&#8226; </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">Accelerating the application of A.I.</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">&#160;We are actively accelerating our application of A.I., which continuously learns from data across the platform, and revolutionizes the experience for our customers. For example, our TurboTax solutions use machine learning to create a customized interview, asking questions uniquely tailored to each individual situation.</span></div><div style="padding-left:30px;text-indent:0px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"><br/></span></div><div style="padding-left:30px;text-indent:0px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c6;">&#8226; </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">Connecting people with experts</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-weight:bold;">:</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">&#160;Across the platform, we are digitizing services by building connections among customers, partners, and experts to inspire confidence in our customers. For example, our TurboTax Live offering seamlessly connects our TurboTax customers with tax experts via a live one-way video. We will continue to develop new means to connect customers with experts so our customers can have confidence that they are making the right decisions about their financial lives, and the personalized experiences they expect. </span></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">As part of our strategy, we also develop relationships with key partners that enable us to scale our service to consumers, small businesses and the self-employed globally, including financial institutions, enterprise platforms, educational institutions and accountants. These partnerships allow us to co-create indispensable connections by sharing expertise, product integrations, and new solutions to solve more customer problems.</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:16px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-top:20px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:11pt;color:#ffffff;font-style:italic;">Industry Trends and Seasonality</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;">Industry Trends</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">A.I. is transforming multiple industries, including financial technology. Disruptive start-ups, emerging ecosystems and mega-platforms are harnessing new technology to create personalized experiences, deliver data-driven insights and increase speed of service. These shifts are creating a more dynamic and highly competitive environment where customer expectations are shifting around the world as more services become digitized and the array of choices continues to increase.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;">Seasonality</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Our Consumer and Strategic Partner offerings have a significant and distinct seasonal pattern as sales and revenue from our income tax preparation products and services are heavily concentrated in the period from November through April. This seasonal pattern results in higher net revenues during our second and third quarters ending January 31 and April 30, respectively. We expect the seasonality of our Consumer and Strategic Partner businesses to continue to have a significant impact on our quarterly financial results in the future.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:16px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-top:20px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:11pt;color:#ffffff;font-style:italic;">Key Challenges and Risks</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Our growth strategy depends upon our ability to initiate and embrace disruptive technology trends, to enter new markets, and to drive broad adoption of the products and services we develop and market. Our future growth also increasingly depends on the strength of our third-party business relationships and our ability to continue to develop, maintain and strengthen new and existing relationships. To remain competitive and continue to grow, we are investing significant resources in our product development, marketing, and sales capabilities, and we expect to continue to do so in the future.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:8px;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">As we offer more online services, the ongoing operation and availability of our platforms and systems and those of our external service providers is becoming increasingly important. Because we help customers manage their financial lives, we face risks associated with the hosting, collection, use, and retention of personal customer information and data. We are investing significant management attention and resources in our information technology infrastructure and in our privacy and security capabilities, and we expect to continue to do so in the future.</span></div><div><br/></div><div style="text-align:center;"><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:10pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="4"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:1%;"></td><td style="width:49%;"></td><td style="width:48%;"></td><td style="width:2%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;border-top:1.5px solid #0077c5;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;border-top:1.5px solid #0077c5;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;border-top:1.5px solid #0077c5;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;border-top:1.5px solid #0077c5;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">&#160;Intuit</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;">&#160;Q2 Fiscal 2020 Form 10-Q</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:right;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;"> 25</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"></hr><div><div style="line-height:120%;font-size:9pt;"><a style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;" href="#s64E223D5AFFE5818B3BEE723B397EC39"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Table of Contents</span></a></div></div><div><br/></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">For our consumer and professional tax offerings, we have implemented additional security measures and are continuing to work with state and federal governments to share information regarding suspicious filings. We continue to invest in security measures and to work with the broader industry and government to protect our customers against this type of fraud.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">For a complete discussion of the most significant risks and uncertainties affecting our business, please see &#8220;Forward-Looking Statements&#8221; immediately preceding Part I and &#8220;Risk Factors&#8221; in Item 1A of Part II of this Quarterly Report.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;font-size:11pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-top:20px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:11pt;color:#ffffff;font-style:italic;">Overview of Financial Results</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">The most important financial indicators that we use to assess our business are revenue growth for the company as a whole and for each reportable segment; operating income growth for the company as a whole; earnings per share; and cash flow from operations. We also track certain non-financial drivers of revenue growth and, when material, identify them in the applicable discussions of segment results below. Service offerings are a significant part of our business. Our total service and other revenue was </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$5.2 billion</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> or </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">76%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> of our total revenue in fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and we expect our total service and other revenue to continue to grow in the future.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:16px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">Key highlights for the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">six months</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;"> of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:10pt;color:#0077c5;font-weight:bold;"> include the following:</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:24pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="5"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:32%;"></td><td style="width:2%;"></td><td style="width:32%;"></td><td style="width:2%;"></td><td style="width:32%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:20px;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">In preparing our financial statements, we make estimates, assumptions and judgments that can have a significant impact on our net revenue, operating income or loss, and net income or loss, as well as on the value of certain assets and liabilities on our condensed consolidated balance sheets. We believe that the estimates, assumptions and judgments involved in the accounting policies described in Management&#8217;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations in Part II, Item&#160;7 of our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">July&#160;31, 2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> have the greatest potential impact on our financial statements, so we consider them to be our critical accounting policies and estimates. Senior management has reviewed the development and selection of our critical accounting policies and estimates and their disclosure in this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q with the Audit and Risk Committee of our Board of Directors.</span></div><div><br/></div><div style="text-align:center;"><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:10pt;"><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Total net revenue for the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">second</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">13%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> compared with the same quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. Our Small Business &amp; Self-Employed segment revenue increased due to growth in Online Ecosystem revenue. Our Consumer segment revenue increased primarily due to more sales in the second quarter of fiscal 2020 due to the IRS accepting returns one day earlier this year than last year. See &#8220;Segment Results&#8221; later in this Item 2 for more information about the results for all of our reportable segments.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Operating income for the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">second</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> increased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$37 million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> or </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">16%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> compared with the same quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. The increase was due to the increase in revenue described above partially offset by higher costs and expenses for staffing, corporate related expenses, and sales and marketing. See &#8220;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-style:italic;">Operating Expenses</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">&#8221; later in this Item&#160;2 for more information.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Net income for the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">second</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> increased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$51 million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> or </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">27%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> due to the increase in operating income described above, a lower effective tax rate in the fiscal 2020 period, and an increase in interest income due to higher average invested balances. See </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-style:italic;">&#8220;Non-Operating Income and Expenses - Interest and Other Income"</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-style:italic;">&#8220;Non-Operating Income and Expenses - Income Taxes&#8221;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> later in this Item 2 for more information. Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> to </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$0.91</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Diluted net income per share increased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">35%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> to </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$1.13</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> for the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">, in line with the increase in net income.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="1"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:100%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#0077c5;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="padding-top:24px;text-align:left;font-size:11pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:11pt;color:#ffffff;font-style:italic;">Segment Results</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:12px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">The information below is organized in accordance with our three reportable segments. Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Segment operating income or loss is segment net revenue less segment cost of revenue and operating expenses. See </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;font-style:italic;">&#8220;Executive Overview &#8211; Industry Trends and Seasonality&#8221;</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> earlier in this Item&#160;2 for a description of the seasonality of our business. Segment expenses do not include certain costs, such as corporate selling and marketing, product development, general and administrative expenses, and share-based compensation expenses, which are not allocated to specific segments. These unallocated costs totaled </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$936 million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$813 million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. Unallocated costs increased in the fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> period due to increased corporate product development, selling and marketing, and general and administrative expenses in support of the growth of our businesses and higher share-based compensation expenses. Segment expenses also do not include amortization of acquired technology and amortization of other acquired intangible assets which totaled </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$15 million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$13 million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. See </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Note 10</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> to the financial statements in Part&#160;I, Item&#160;1 of this Quarterly Report for reconciliations of total segment operating income or loss to consolidated operating income or loss for each fiscal period presented.</span></div><div><br/></div><div style="text-align:center;"><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:10pt;"><div Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Small Business &amp; Self-Employed segment includes both Online Ecosystem and Desktop Ecosystem revenue.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Our Online Ecosystem includes revenue from QuickBooks Online, QuickBooks Live, QuickBooks Online Advanced and QuickBooks Self-Employed financial and business management offerings; small business payroll services, including QuickBooks Online Payroll, Intuit Online Payroll, Intuit Full Service Payroll; merchant payment processing services for small businesses who use online offerings; and financing for small businesses.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Our Desktop Ecosystem includes revenue from our QuickBooks Desktop packaged software products (Desktop Pro, Desktop for Mac, Desktop Premier, and QuickBooks Point of Sale); QuickBooks Desktop software subscriptions (QuickBooks Desktop Pro Plus, QuickBooks Desktop Premier Plus, and QuickBooks Enterprise, and ProAdvisor Program memberships for the accounting professionals who serve small businesses); desktop payroll products (QuickBooks Basic Payroll, QuickBooks Assisted Payroll and QuickBooks Enhanced Payroll); merchant payment processing services for small businesses who use desktop offerings; and financial supplies.</span></div></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Segment product revenue is derived from revenue related to software license and version protection for our QuickBooks Desktop products and subscriptions, license and related updates for our desktop payroll products and financial supplies, which are all part of our Desktop Ecosystem. Segment service and other revenue is derived from our Online Ecosystem revenue; and Desktop Ecosystem revenue related to support and connected services for our QuickBooks Desktop and desktop payroll products and subscriptions and merchant payment processing services.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:left;font-size:10pt;"><div Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">%</span></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><span style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</span></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Revenue for our Small Business &amp; Self-Employed segment increased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$140 million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> or </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">17%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">second</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">$278 million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> or </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">16%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> compared with the same periods of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. The increase in both periods was primarily due to growth in Online Ecosystem revenue.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;color:#0077c5;font-style:italic;">Online Ecosystem</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:4px;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Online Ecosystem revenue increased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">35%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">second</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">35%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> compared with the same periods of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. QuickBooks Online Accounting revenue increased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">43%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">second</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">42%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> primarily due to an increase in customers as well as higher effective prices and a shift in mix to our higher priced offerings. Online Services revenue increased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">23%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">second</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> and </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">25%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> in the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">. Online payroll revenue increased due to a shift in mix to our full service offering. Online payments revenue increased due to an increase in customers and an increase in charge volume per customer.</span></div><div><br/></div><div style="text-align:center;"><div million</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> or </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">9%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> compared with the same period of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> primarily due to more sales in the second quarter of fiscal 2020 due to the IRS accepting returns one day earlier this year than last year. Operating income decreased </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">4%</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> primarily due to higher expenses for staffing, advertising and marketing partially offset by the higher revenue.</span></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-top:8px;text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">Due to the seasonality of our Consumer offerings, we do not believe that revenue or operating results for the first </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">six</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> months of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> is indicative of trends for the full fiscal year. We will not have substantially complete results for the </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2019</span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;"> tax season until the third quarter of fiscal </span><span style="font-family:Avenir LT Pro 55 Roman,sans-serif;font-size:9pt;">2020</span><span
